TopicTitle: Question about overriding public properties through config.

Articles.Content:
As I am just looking at the class definition for the dockingNode.

I want to ask, as I have never been sure, is it possible to override those properties in the config file (Mainly the acquire force and stuff)?

Also, how may I see the default values these are assigned?

Sorry if this is a really dumb or basic question.

As they're KSP fields, just put entries for the values you want to override in the config section for that module. They'll be given a default value in the code, but config values over write those when the part is loaded.

For default values, that would need some plugin trickery, though: find the module in the part, spit the values out for those variables to the log or whatever.

You come to my help yet again!

Many thanks for the answer!
No drama, you just happened to ask about a couple of things I actually have some experience with
